version_description: Bug fixes and performance optimizations
Bug fixes and performance optimizations.
Bug fixes and performance optimizations.

• Live games anytime, anywhere. FOX Sports Mobile now has live streams of the biggest national sporting events including MLB, College Football & Basketball, NASCAR Xfinity, Truck and Monster Energy Series races, UFC and Golf, plus local NBA, MLB and NHL games.
• Tune-In Alerts. Whenever you can watch your favorite teams and sports in FOX Sports Mobile, we’ll let you know.
• FOX Sports Podcast and Shows: With all-new podcasts and shows, enjoy Undisputed, Speak for Yourself, First Things First and the rest of your favorite FOX Sports content on the go. Get alerts when new episodes are available to stream, download podcasts to listen offline and watch the best clips of the day all from a completely revamped design that delivers you the content you love.
March Madness Bracket: Want to follow every twist and turn of the NCAA Tournament? With the all-new bracket view, you can track every game as teams advance throughout the tourney.

FOX Sports is your home for the 2019 FIFA Women’s World Cup France™
• Watch FOX’s live coverage of all 52 matches with a TV provider login.
• Introducing ‘No Spoilers Mode’: Joining a match late? We’ll take you right into the match and shield you from scores and game-related notifications.
• Plus full match replays, and all the great highlights, news, and analysis you expect from FOX Sports

As part of our ongoing efforts to improve this app, this release includes several bug fixes and performance enhancements

• Added streaming content from Fox digital channels and Fox Soccer Plus.
• Fixed some bugs.

• Several improvements to video playback.
• Added support for AirPlay 2.
• Many other bug fixes and improvements.

• Several improvements to video playback.
• Added support for AirPlay 2.
• Many other bug fixes and improvements.

You've asked and we've listened! We're making our beta implementation of Chromecast available in this release. Please be patient as we work out the kinks over the next few app releases. To cast, start streaming a live show, tap the screen to display the player controls, then tap the cast button in the upper-right corner. Please note that you must be on the same WiFi network for casting to work. We currently do not support casting to nearby devices.

This release includes Chromecast enhancements, in addition to bug fixes and general stability improvements.

Thanks for using the FOX Sports app! This release includes:
• A fresh, hassle-free experience for watching Super Bowl LIV
• Improvements to Chromecast and AirPlay
• Video streaming improvements
• Several bug fixes and performance enhancements

Thanks for using the FOX Sports app! This release includes:
• Added XFL scores and standings screens. The scores screen will update in real-time during live games.
• Fixed an issue where some alerts couldn't be turned off for soccer leagues.
• Several bug fixes and performance improvements.

Thanks for using the FOX Sports app! This release includes:
• Support for Wrestlemania 36.
• Better handling of canceled/postponed events.
• Removed Facebook login option.
• Several bug fixes and performance improvements.

The All-New Fox Sports app allows you to easily find the latest sports stories, scores, schedules and standings. It also allows for best-in-class discoverability of live games, speed, quality, and stability for the top properties in sports and lets you get the latest scoop without leaving the app from various data sources, visualizations, team news via content integration, and social conversations from experts and fans.

The all-new FOX Sports App, built for the modern sports fan. Stories. Live TV. Bonus Cams. Favorite Teams, Players and Leagues. Scores. And much more.

Key features include:
• STORIES: Users swipe into the most important topics of the day, featuring multimedia perspective and analysis from the most important voices in sports. Driven by editorial sensibility and data-driven insights, each story provides a 360-degree view on the sports topics that matter most.

• LIVE TV: Every FOX Sports game and studio show is available to TV subscribers with the tap of a button. Users watch in full-screen mode or flip vertically to get real-time stats, projections, highlights, social feeds and more. NFL, MLB, NASCAR, MLS, College Football, College Basketball, WWE, PBC, PBA and Liga MX, as well as all FS1 and FOX Deportes daily studio shows, are just a click away.

• BONUS CAMS: Select games and events will now include patent-pending Bonus Cams, where fans can watch the live telecast while choosing between secondary feeds with different camera angles and perspectives.

• SCORES: Fan research shows a desire for easy-to-navigate score pages that are elevated within the experience. The new design simplifies access to the scores and schedules fans want. The date, time and TV network are featured alongside the key odds (spread, money line, total) from the FOX Bet Sportsbook.

• FAVORITES: Fans can personalize their experience by choosing their favorite leagues, teams and players. Robust content sections for all Favorites are highlighted on the Explore tab.

New for Version 5.4: We’ve now including expanded odds information on most games, before, during and after the event. In addition, fans will find odds information on league and team pages. Also, numerous bug fixes and feature enhancements are included in this release.

Version 5.5.1 update: Turn your phone sideways on event pages for a new landscape experience to watch bonus feeds, along with the live stream of the game.
